name: OCKAnyContactViewSynchronizerProtocol
desc: A protocol that makes and updates views in a type-erased view synchronizer for contacts.

items.name: func makeAnyView() -> UIView & OCKContactDisplayable
items.desc: Creates a view to be synchronized.

items.name: func updateAnyView(UIView & OCKContactDisplayable, context: OCKSynchronizationContext<OCKAnyContact?>)
items.desc: Updates a view using a specific context
